name: The Facility (itch) (Conciliated)
description:
My game is an experience about the player trying to escape a facility in a dystopian future. As the game progresses and the player learns more and more about their surroundings, they’ll begin to figure out that the world around them is barren and there are multiple facilities scattered throughout the area. People in the facilities are forced to work long hours and are given the basic necessities to survive to work another day. 

The player's role in the game is to make their way to an escape house, they are actively making decisions that could lead them to their demise. So the player must be observant and learn from their past mistakes to figure out how to overcome them.
